m64tweak.description:
Changes the soundbank location. Default Location: 593560
Credit to Blake.
m64tweak.patch:
D4886: [16, "Part 1 (DEFAULT: 0059)", hex] D488E: [16, "Part 2 (DEFAULT: 3560)", hex] D48A2: [copy, D4886, D4888] D48A6: [copy, D488E, D4890]
//For XXXXXXXX, change the value to place you want the soundbank to go XXXXXXXX: [copy, 593560, 7B0860]
